feed.title: Semaphore UI Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Semaphore UI: v2.14.3
entry.content:
Bugfixes

  • Fixed latest database migration https://github.com/semaphoreui/semaphore/issues/2976
  • Fixed database request for session expiration https://github.com/semaphoreui/semaphore/issues/2974

entry.title: New release for Semaphore UI: v2.14.4
entry.content:
Bugfixes

  • Restore ability to set timezone for Schedule: Added config option schedule.timezone and environment variable SEMAPHORE_SCHEDULE_TIMEZONE.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/semaphoreui/semaphore/compare/v2.14.3...v2.14.4

entry.title: New release for Semaphore UI: v2.14.5
New release for Semaphore UI: v2.14.6
entry.content:
Bugfixes

  • Fixed error log message: "Level=error msg="remove /data/semaphore/project_1/repository_3_template_3_inventory_3: directory not empty"

entry.title: New release for Semaphore UI: v2.14.7
entry.content:
Bugfixes

  • Fixed migrations undo command:

semaphore migrate --undo-to 2.14 * Fixed issue with error 404 on Schedule page.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/semaphoreui/semaphore/compare/v2.14.6...v2.14.7
